title: amirheavy666
author: amirheavy666
content: Every person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!my idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X   what's your idea?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!Doesn't it seem that what you are trying to reach is very exaggerated, 10X increase in the price is something that is possible, but 100 times? Especially since your list contained currencies with high market capacities, and therefore a hundredfold means billions of dollars to rise>?You can get it with of pump/dump coins, but such currencies are closer to scam than investments.Also, most of the altcoins that rose in the past fail to rise again independently, and therefore the possibility of rising from this leader is very weak.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: If it were an altcoin, it would be hard to decide which is worth buying because all altcoins provide the same expectation, even for the altcoins currently occupying the top spot. All altcoins can increase greatly and some can surpass other altcoins, so it will be very difficult to find them.Maybe you need to concentrate on the altcoins that are on the top 100 list in the market. But my advice, you better focus on buying bitcoin and saving bitcoin because bitcoin can give hope for profit. But that's up to you and I see you already have a list of the coins. So you can start buying it at this time.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: We all have the idea that 2024, it's the year where the halving will happen, and anticipate that 2025 is the bull run. But every cycle and bull run is always different.Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMmy idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X  Those are that much to expect, I'm thinking of little with the gain of the market by the next bull run comes. It's historically that the gains through multiplier have decreased but the value and price became higher.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMmy idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X  As far as experienced though, ADA is one coin that give me good profits in the last bull run. But I can't agree more, those other coins that you have listed looks very solid, maybe just Shiba though. I'm not a fan of it, I mean clearly it's just a meme coin.BNB as well might be a good coin to add to your portfolio.Anyhow, there could be other projects that could really give us good profits in the next bull run. But it's up to us to find it out, that needle in the haystack.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: I am one of those people who are very optimistic about this space, but I never target a certain year like you do. Not without reason, because if I do something like that when I don't get what I want from my analysis it will make me feel very disappointed. I prefer to let the water flow without targeting a specific year or time. I prefer to target the profit I want to achieve. For example, from $100 to $110, that's more reasonable in my opinion than targeting a certain year.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: I also believe that in 2024 there will be growth in many coins and tokens,but not tenfold, this is a very strange forecast.Where should so much new money come from on the market?Yes, the projects from the list will show a good result,but you need to go another distance a year, and anything can happen during this period.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AM1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X   what's your idea? Maybe we should be conservative with our prediction as those 10x is highly possible only if the market would be good depends on the entire movement of bitcoin and major coins.With that 10x on eth might be impossible if weve checked its current marketcap. The other L1 might be possible considering their current marketcap.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Definitely Bitcoin. Have you heard of the 2nd halving? Not to rely on what happened on the previous one but, that could be a contributing factor. But since 2024 is still a long run, it would be better to pick coins which has potential to have a price increase based on their utility or  their involvement with different peojects such as ETH, and BNB. I guess I'd stay away from meme coins; it is so hard to predict when will the demand on such coin will rise. Most of the time, uprise movements on those coins are sue to whale manipulation or if someone like elon musk would mention it. But measuring the possible rate of increase I guess is not necessary; just the chance of those coins to increase in order to avoid over expecting and miscalculating investment movements.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: I guess, many coins will increase higher in 2024 for those that invested in Bitcoin and altcoins to get ready to earn from their investments. Ethereum and ADA will be the best coins that will reward people in the future with huge amount of profits that will make people to invest more on Ethereum and ADA in 2025 because there are some positive changes in Ethereum and ADA that made people to believed that the coins will pump very well in 2024 for people to earn well from their long term investments.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: This topic looks better in speculation section I believe, anyways, why do you believe that Shiba can still do 100x in future? I don't think it's possible for Shiba to go that high again because that project is one of the very few that brings the highest returns for investors in last bull market.The next real gains will come from projects that are less known to the public, nothing beats buying Matic at 0.01$ years ago but now the chances of bringing such insane returns is lower.I will prefer something new if 100x is my target for the next bull market. Q

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Your prediction was too good to be true. Just expect 3x for all of crypto will be so hard. As your prediction and then it seems like that anything was worth to buy as long as it has a very big marketcap. Why don't you put all of top coins in your list?  Shiba to did 100x just another crazy thing that will never come true. This meme token has huge marketcap. It's also over rated as a decentralized application for sure. I don't even know what's your reason to give all of them possibility to increase a lot.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!what's your idea? In general i think that a bear market like the one that we are in right now is of course never a good thing, but at least it provides an opportunity to invest into projects that are already pretty big like the ones that you have mentioned. I personally would never invest into Shiba Inu though and i also heavily doubt that it will make a x100 from here on. I think the time of meme-coins is over and Shiba Inu will slowly but surely lose relevance because in the end it is just a useless shitcoin. Your other predictions are also very optimistic i would not expect a x10. I mean i hope that but i don't think it will come that way, so only invest money that you can afford to lose.Cosmos (Atom) is also a good project in my opinion.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Although I do not have any prediction list on my own as the market hasn't made things easy lately.  I do hope your prediction on near becomes realistic because am holding that coin and honestly I don't like how it loses so much since it's last ath, I expect more resistant from near but rather it just keep falling at will. Right now, I want to see how low it goes come 2023 so I can then dca.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!my idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X   what's your idea? The answer for me however are Bitcoin and Ethereum. They're more into long term as they are capable of bouncing back stronger no matter how long the bear market would be. BTC is very popular and widely adopted worldwide while ETH is more into Dapps. These are the only ones I see worth to DCA (dollar-cost averaging) in the long run until we see another bull run especially that the halving period will come by 2024.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!my idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X   what's your idea? It possible that Bitcoin and Ethereum might get to their ATH by 2024 But for the rest of them I have little to no faith in them. But let's just see how it goes before then we might still see a new coin with unique utility that has lots of potentials and not just some project trying to repeat other's idea. Like I said in the beginning Bitcoin and Ethereum skyrocketting is sure if nothing bad happens in the crypto space

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Yeah, I think ETH will do good as it is a prime mover same with BTC.Not sure about ADA, but I will tell you that I made a good investment on them on the last bear market and obviously sold at the bull run. But it seems that they have change their path, becoming a privacy focus protocol, which might be a bad idea for Chris and his project.3-5? maybe, but seems the hype for them is gone already. Might be good investment for the next bull run but the returns might not be that huge.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!my idea :1- ETH---10X   2- ADA---20X   3- MATIC---10X   4-SHIBA--100X  5-NEAR---50X  6-DOT--20X  what's your idea? And why an earth you think that high marketcap coins have that much room to grow. You do realize that shiba 100x would go over bitcoin in marketcap. That's crazy talk. No real token that should be taken seriously has ever done that. I understand that when i tell you that Ada is garbage and should stay down, most fanbois disagree. And Eth 10x would go 3x over bitcoin mc so where's btc in this calculation?I am not even going to bother with your other predicions as they seem something totally made up without any reasoning.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: amirheavy666 on December 10, 2022, 10:23:17 AMEvery person who lives with cryptos know that cryptocurrencies will dump in 2023 and in 2024 we will more grow...so in this topic, we discuss which coin is better to buy for more gains about 10X to 1000X!...You are simply expecting too much out of this market and even more importantly you are trying to get a position in the altcoin market that is too risky too soon, you need to remember as well that at first the coin that goes through the most growth at the beginning of a bull season is bitcoin, and then the altcoin season comes alive, so the logical decision would be to buy bitcoin and then once the bull run is underway and the altcoin market seems ready then you could invest some money in it.

comments.author: Ayers
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on December 11, 2022, 12:05:31 AMAnd Eth 10x would go 3x over bitcoin mc so where's btc in this calculation?ETH's ATH in 2021 is close to $5k, and if ETH hits $10k next bull season, I wouldn't be surprised either, keep in mind that the bull market means Bitcoin will also go up, it does not stand still and wait for ETH to pass. If people's expectation for bitcoin's ATH is $100k or $150k, then bitcoin will also increase 10x from now. I don't remember the exact time, but if you haven't missed any market events over the past 13 years, there was a time when ethereum's capitalization surpassed bitcoin's, but it didn't last too long. Anything can happen in this market, don't be too surprised.
